name: Tori Tori Panic!
description:
This is the postmortem release of our Ludum Dare 36 submission of the same name. I'll be sporadically updating the game here. Upcoming roadmap items include Mac support, Linux support, and more levels.

Control a prehistoric archer in the hunt for fearsome avian beasts (>.<) Use arrow deflection, trajectories, and clever timing (or possibly 360-no-scoping) to snipe your meal.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move/jump. [Update] "Space" now also jumps. Hold the left mouse button to charge and aim your bow, then release to fire.

Programming: Alex Zikai Wen, Yiming Li

Art: Chang Lu

Music: Jeff Huang

The OG submission
